content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: blue_banner
inventory=[{"type": "purple_banner", "quantity": 13, "index": 11}, {"type": "melon", "quantity": 43, "index": 13}, {"type": "music_disc_strad", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "creeper_spawn_egg", "quantity": 59, "index": 15}, {"type": "cooked_mutton", "quantity": 21, "index": 16}, {"type": "blue_dye", "quantity": 6, "index": 17}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "blackstone_slab", "quantity": 47, "index": 21}, {"type": "cut_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 2, "index": 22}, {"type": "light_gray_banner", "quantity": 13, "index": 27}, {"type": "oak_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "sandstone_slab", "quantity": 24, "index": 31}, {"type": "purple_terracotta", "quantity": 45, "index": 36}, {"type": "gold_block", "quantity": 13, "index": 37}, {"type": "slime_ball", "quantity": 16, "index": 40}, {"type": "fletching_table", "quantity": 24, "index": 41}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 6, "index": 42}, {"type": "coarse_dirt", "quantity": 21, "index": 43}, {"type": "stripped_birch_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}, {"type": "light_blue_dye", "quantity": 22, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft a blue banner, I need to craft 6 blue wool. To craft blue wool, I need to craft 6 blue dye and 6 white wool. I have enough white wool in my inventory, but I only have 6 blue dye. Therefore, I will start by moving the blue dye from slot 17 to the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 17 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 42 to slot 2 with quantity 1
